title: Understanding Financial Vulnerability Prediction Modeling in Emerging Economies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic statistics, understanding of machine learning concepts, and ability to interpret macroeconomic indicators
context.additional_context: Learners are professionals in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical) with advanced domain expertise and must be familiar with microlearning environments using mobile devices

learning_goals: Explain the five core factors (GDP growth rate, inflation rate, monetary policy, interest rate, bank capital-to-asset ratio) affecting financial vulnerabilities in emerging economies, focusing on BRICS countries
Apply financial vulnerability prediction methodologies through the optimization process of BPNN (Back-Propagation Neural Network) models
Apply multivariate data reduction techniques using PCA (Principal Component Analysis) to actual financial datasets
Analyze the impact of global economic fluctuations on emerging economies' financial systems through case-based studies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
